system.name: Face Me Whelp
system.effect: While your Pokémon is adjacent to a foe they Marked, that foe gains a -X penalty to Accuracy Rolls and a -10 penalty to Damage Rolls on attacks that do not target the Pokémon that Marked them. X is equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank.
system.prerequisites: Close Quarters Mastery, Type-Linked Skill at Expert
